Workflow.Name: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v3 (Orphaned Users)
Workflow.Description: This flow runs weekly, and checks if any makers have left the organization - if maker information can not be found in Azure AD/Office 365 Users, any resources created by the maker (apps, cloud and desktop flows, environments, chatbots) are marked as orphaned.

LocalizedName.description: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v3 (Orphaned Users)

Description.description: This flow runs weekly, and checks if any makers have left the organization - if maker information can not be found in Azure AD/Office 365 Users, any resources created by the maker (apps, cloud and desktop flows, environments, chatbots) are marked as orphaned.
